text: Provoking Laughter is a 2016 Chinese adventure crime comedy film directed by Tang Xu and starring Pan Yueming, Wu Yue, Chang Yuan, Archie Kao, Tan Kai and Lin Peng. It was released in China by Dadi Century Films Distribution on 29 December 2016. ==Plot== ==Cast== *Pan Yueming *Wu Yue *Chang Yuan *Archie Kao *Tan Kai *Lin Peng *Chin Shih-chieh ==Reception== The film has grossed in China. ==References== Category:Chinese films Category:Chinese comedy films Category:Chinese crime films Category:Chinese crime comedy films Category:2010s crime comedy films Category:2010s adventure films Category:2016 comedy films
title: Provoking Laughter
